title: MD
biography: He Jiankui  is a Chinese biophysicist known for his controversial first use of genome editing in humans in 2018. He was listed as one of Time's 100 most influential people of 2019, in the section "Pioneers". At the same time, he was widely condemned as a mad scientist.
aiSummary: He Jiankui is a genetics(controversial case)first claimed crispr-edited embryos specialist with an H-index of 10 at SUSTech (Member). Has been published in Science Translational Medicine, Interdisciplinary Sciences Computational Life Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
